ui.projects_text: A selection of projects demonstrating my expertise in backend development and system architecture.
ui.contact_text: I'm currently open to new opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
ui.resume_page_desc: View or download my resume to learn more about my experience and skills.

profile.name: Rohit Singh
profile.tagline: Building scalable solutions with modern technologies.
profile.bio: An experienced Software Developer with over 6 years of expertise in backend technologies such as Spring, Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, Node.js, and Express.js, along with proficiency in frontend technologies including React, Bootstrap, and jQuery. Skilled in working with diverse clients across various industries, specializing in project management, API development, optimization, and integration of third-party services. Adept at implementing secure, scalable, and efficient solutions utilizing a combination of open-source and proprietary technologies.

experience.description: Working on building UI using React and Svelte, and developing backend services using Spring Boot. Hands-on experience with various AWS services primarily S3, EC2, Kafka, and RDBMS.
Started as a private blockchain and UI developer using Hyperledger Fabric, Golang, and Go-Gin. Built user interfaces using React.

projects.title: Logistics Billing and Rating System
projects.tech: Java, Spring, Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, iTextPDF, AWS
projects.description: Aimed to streamline the billing and rating process for clients in the logistics industry. Generated shipments for TL and LTL freight types, dynamic billing and rating APIs, and customized bills using iTextPDF. Integrated AWS services like RDS, DynamoDB, S3, SMS, and SNS.
responsibilities: Developed dynamic billing and rating APIs using Java and Spring framework.
Integrated iTextPDF for generating customized bills.
Optimized the existing rating service by implementing multithreading and CompletableFuture, resulting in a 30% decrease in response time.
Integrated and utilized various AWS services such as RDS, DynamoDB, S3, SMS, and SNS.
Designed and implemented event-driven services with procedures and consumers.

projects.title: Digital Self-Service Platform
projects.tech: Java, Spring Boot, Launch4j, React, jQuery, Docker, Swagger
projects.description: Provided users with a consistent and speedy self-service experience across several platforms. Included recurring payment creation, automated notifications, batch tasks, and digital signature processing. Used Java and Spring Boot for SDKs and React/jQuery for UI.
responsibilities: Developed cross-platform executable SDKs for database setup using Java and Spring and launch4J.
Created batch processing jobs for automated tasks.
Integrated Precisely notification provider for automated notifications.
Developed and maintained UI components using React, jQuery, and internal tech stack.
Utilized Docker for creating deployable containers.
Managed contract-first Swagger API configuration for various services.

projects.title: Webinar Platform
projects.tech: Java, Spring Boot, Express.js, Sequelize ORM
projects.description: Facilitated seamless communication between hosts and participants. Involved creating automated customizable email notifications, work schedulers for batch mail processing, and a video compression module.
responsibilities: Implemented automated customizable email notifications using Java and Spring Boot.
Developed different work schedulers for batch mail processing.
Created APIs using Express.js and Sequelize ORM for efficient data management.
Integrated a video compression module for transcoding videos into various formats and sizes.
Implemented streaming for fast video rendering on servers.
